00006 namespace BulletHell.Game.Library.xml
00007 {
00008     public class XmlTag
00009     {
00010         public String Tag { get; private set; } // name of the tag
00011         public Dictionary<String, String> Attributes { get; private set; } // Key = Value pair. If Value is not specified, the default will be used
00012 
00013         /* Attributes that are required. If the required attribs are not specified, XmlValidator will throw an exception */
00014         public List<String> EssentialAttributes { get; private set; }
00015         public List<XmlTag> Children { get; private set; }
00016         public bool Initialized { get; private set; }
00017         public int tagId { get; set; } // Unique tag ID for this type of tags
00018 
00019         public XmlTag(String tag, Dictionary<String, String> attributes, List<XmlTag> children)
00020         {
00021             Tag = tag;
00022             Attributes = attributes;
00023             Children = children;
00024             Initialized = true;
00025             Attributes = new Dictionary<string, string>();
00026             EssentialAttributes = new List<string>();
00027             Children = new List<XmlTag>();
00028         }
00029 
00030         public XmlTag(String tag, Dictionary<String, String> attributes) : this(tag, attributes, null) { }
00031 
00032         public XmlTag(String tag) : this(tag, null, null) { }
00033 
00034         public XmlTag(XmlTag tag)
00035         { // C# doesn't have the idea of copy constructor!
00036             Tag = tag.Tag;
00037             tagId = tag.tagId;
00038 
00039             if (tag.Attributes != null)
00040             {
00041                 Attributes = new Dictionary<string, string>();
00042                 foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in tag.Attributes)
00043                     Attributes.Add(attrib.Key, attrib.Value);
00044             }
00045 
00046             if (tag.Children != null)
00047             {
00048                 Children = new List<XmlTag>();
00049                 foreach (XmlTag child in tag.Children)
00050                     Children.Add(child);
00051             }
00052 
00053             if (tag.EssentialAttributes != null)
00054             {
00055                 EssentialAttributes = new List<string>();
00056                 foreach (string attrib in tag.EssentialAttributes)
00057                     EssentialAttributes.Add(attrib);
00058             }
00059 
00060             Initialized = true;
00061         }
00062 
00063         public XmlTag() { Initialized = false; }
00064 
00065         /* Prints the tag, its attribs. Doesn't print its children */
00066         public void printTag(String frontAppend)
00067         {
00068             Console.WriteLine(frontAppend + "Tag: " + Tag);
00069             Console.Write(frontAppend + "Attributes: ");
00070             if (Attributes != null && Attributes.Count > 0)
00071             {
00072                 Console.WriteLine("");
00073 
00074                 foreach (KeyValuePair<String, String> attrib in Attributes)
00075                     Console.WriteLine(frontAppend + "\t" + attrib.Key + " = " + attrib.Value);
00076             }
00077             else
00078                 Console.WriteLine("none");
00079         }
00080 
00081         public void printTag()
00082         {
00083             printTag("");
00084         }
00085 
00086         /* Prints the tag, its attribs and its children's tag name */
00087         public void printTagVerbose(String frontAppend)
00088         {
00089             printTag();
00090             Console.Write(frontAppend + "Children Tag: ");
00091             if (Children != null && Children.Count > 0)
00092             {
00093                 Console.WriteLine("");
00094                 for (int i = 0; i < Children.Count; ++i)
00095                     Console.WriteLine(frontAppend + "\t" + Children[i]);
00096             }
00097             else
00098                 Console.WriteLine("none");
00099         }
00100     }
